participant_1.background:
I live off the land and I'm content with my simple life.
I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk.
my boyfriend works for nasa.
my father recently had a heart attack.
i am a goalie.

participant_2.background:
I try my best to keep up with my family, but it can be difficult with my busy schedule.
I want to take my uniform off and relax.
i enjoy broadway shows.
i am the youngest of 3.
my parents are in there 80s.

content.text: I'm at the park listening to my favorite rock songs. Do you have a favorite song?
I like broadway shows so I guess I'd say the Phantom of the Opera.
I've heard of that, it's supposed to be really good. What is it about?
It's about a deformed man who lives in the catacombs underneath the opera house and falls in love with a beautiful soprano.
That sounds interesting, I'll have to check it out. What are you up to today?
I'm on my way to work. I'm a nurse in a hospital.
Oh that's cool. I'm a goalie for a hockey team.
That sounds exciting. I'm sure it's a lot of fun.
It is. I love it. How do you like being a nurse?
It's rewarding. I get to help people and make a difference in their lives.
That's awesome. I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks. I do. What's your favorite thing about being a goalie?
I love the adrenaline rush. It's so much fun to make a save and keep the puck out of the net.
That sounds really exciting. I'm glad you enjoy it.
Thanks. I do. How's your day going so far?
It's going well. I'm just about to get into work.
Oh cool. Have a good day!
